last_episode_to_air.name: Sorrell and Son
last_episode_to_air.overview: In post-World War I England, impoverished Captain Stephen Sorrell (Richard Pasco) must raise his son Kit (Paul Critchley) by himself, after his wife had walked out on him. Captain Sorrell's years of devotion and sacrifice for his son come to fruition years in the future.

name: Sorrell and Son
overview: Heartfelt story of a father making sacrifices to help his son over the years. Remake of one of films great "lost films"
